parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The identifier of the stream session

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if an error [false] if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if an error [false if no error happened]

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

error_codes.description: You do not have permission to bestdream

notes: The documentation includes several URLs for different environments (test, dev, etc.) and includes request/response examples in various formats (JSON, Python). There are also additional error codes listed in the image that indicate various error conditions related to sessions and permissions.
